trans-unit.source: Provides access to information received by the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> class when accepting WebSocket connections.
Gets the cookies received by the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object in the WebSocket opening handshake.
Returns <xref:System.Net.CookieCollection>.
The cookies received by the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
Gets the HTTP headers received by the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object in the WebSocket opening handshake.
Returns <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
The HTTP headers received by the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
Gets a value that indicates if the WebSocket client is authenticated.
Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the WebSocket client is authenticated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates if the WebSocket client connected from the local machine.
Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the WebSocket client connected from the local machine; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates if the WebSocket connection is secured using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).
Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the WebSocket connection is secured using SSL; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the value of the Origin HTTP header included in the WebSocket opening handshake.
Returns <xref:System.String>.
The value of the Origin HTTP header.
Gets the URI requested by the WebSocket client.
Returns <xref:System.Uri>.
The URI requested by the WebSocket client.
Gets the value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header included in the WebSocket opening handshake.
Returns <xref:System.String>.
The value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header.
Gets the list of the Secure WebSocket protocols included in the WebSocket opening handshake.
Returns <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
The list of the Secure WebSocket protocols.
Gets the list of sub-protocols requested by the WebSocket client.
Returns <xref:System.String>.
The list of sub-protocols requested by the WebSocket client.
Gets an object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the WebSocket client.
Returns <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>.
The identity, authentication information, and security roles for the WebSocket client.
Gets the WebSocket instance used to send and receive data over the WebSocket connection.
Returns <xref href="System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket"></xref>.
The WebSocket instance.
